title: How to Block Group Texts on Android

steps.title: Open Messages.
steps.content: Open Messages. It's the app with a white speech bubble on a blue background.

steps.title: Tap and hold the group conversation.
steps.content: Tap and hold the group conversation. Look for the group conversation you want to mute and long press on the conversation. This will open some additional options at the top of the screen.

steps.title: Tap .
steps.content: Tap . It's the icon that looks like a bell with a diagonal line going through it on the top-right of the screen. This disables notifications for the group conversation and your phone will no longer notify you of messages from this conversation.

steps.title: Open Textra.
steps.content: Open Textra. It's the app with an icon that resembles a blue speech bubble with white curvy lines inside of it. You can download Textra SMS from the Google Play Store for free if you want to blacklist a group conversation.

steps.title: Tap a group conversation.
steps.content: Tap a group conversation. Tap the group text conversation you want to blacklist to open the conversation.

steps.title: Tap .
steps.content: Tap . It's in the menu bar at the top-right corner of the screen.

steps.title: Tap ⋮.
steps.content: Tap ⋮ . It's the icon with three vertical dots that appears in the menu bar at the top of the screen. This opens a small drop-down menu.

steps.title: Tap Blacklist.
steps.content: Tap Blacklist . It's the first option at the top. A message will appear at the bottom of the screen confirming the group conversation has been blacklisted.

steps.title: Tap .
steps.content: Tap . Tap the left-pointing arrow in the top-left corner of the screen to go back to the main messaging menu. The group conversation is removed and you will no longer receive texts from the group. You can un-blacklist the group conversation at any time by tapping ⋮ , tap Settings , tap Blacklisted , tap the group conversation, then tap Unblacklist .

steps.title: Open Messages.
steps.content: Open Messages. It's the app with a white speech bubble on a blue background.

steps.title: Tap the group conversation.
steps.content: Tap the group conversation. A group conversation is any conversation that has more than two participants.

steps.title: Tap ⋮.
steps.content: Tap ⋮ . It's the icon of three vertical dots in the upper-right corner. This will open a drop-down menu.

steps.title: Tap People & options.
steps.content: Tap People & options . It's the first option at the top of the menu. This opens the settings page for the group text.

steps.title: Tap a member of the group.
steps.content: Tap a member of the group. It's at the bottom of the page. This opens the member's contact information and details.

steps.title: Tap .
steps.content: Tap . It's the message icon that resembles a speech bubble with the word "Text" underneath. It's located under the person's name or contact number, to the right of the phone icon. This starts a new text message conversation with the person or number.

steps.title: Tap ⋮.
steps.content: Tap ⋮ . It's the icon of three vertical dots in the upper-right corner. This will open a drop-down menu.

steps.title: Tap People & options.
steps.content: Tap People & options . It's the first option at the top of the menu. This opens the settings page for the group text.

steps.title: Tap Block (Phone Number).
steps.content: Tap Block (Phone Number) . This will display the contact's phone number instead of "(Phone Number)". It's under the "Vibrate" option on the settings page. This will open a confirmation pop-up window.

steps.title: Tap Block to confirm.
steps.content: Tap Block to confirm. It's in the bottom-right corner of the pop-up window. This will block all text messages from this sender.

steps.title: Tap and repeat this process for the other members in the group text.
steps.content: Tap and repeat this process for the other members in the group text. Go back to the main Messages page and select the group text conversation to repeat this process for the other members in the group text.
